#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define LD long double
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define bitcount _builtin_popcount
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 1000090

int N;
map<int,string>winner;
map<string,int>level;
string str;

template<typename T>T absll(T X)
{
	if(X<0)
		return -1*X;
	else
		return X;
}

int main()
{
	cin>>N;
	while(N--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		int l=1;
		if(level.find(str)!=level.end())
		{
			l=level[str]+1;
		}
		level[str]=l;
		
		if(winner.find(l)==winner.end())
		{
			winner[l]=str;
		}
	}
	map<int,string>::iterator it;
	
	for(it=winner.begin();it!=winner.end();it++)
	{
		cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<endl;
	}
	level.clear();
	winner.clear();
	return 0;
}
